meanings.definition: woadwaxes: third person singular present of woadwax
meanings.sent2: He woadwaxes the garden with care.
meanings.sent3: The cat woadwaxes lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Time woadwaxes slowly when you're waiting.
meanings.sent5: The river woadwaxes gently through the valley.

meanings.sent2: I saw a field full of woadwaxes.
meanings.sent3: The woadwaxes danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like woadwaxes in spring.
meanings.sent5: The woadwaxes added a vibrant touch to the garden.
